verbose_text: Colony stimulating factor receptor 1 (CSF1R)-CreERT transgenic mice (CSF1R-CreERT Tg/WT), provided by J. Pollard (University of Edinburgh, UK), in which a tamoxifen induced Cre is under the transcriptional control of the human CSF1R promoter, were crossed with GS floxed mice (GS L/L).
evidence: tamoxifen-induced Cre is under the transcriptional control of the human CSF1R
